Package com.dhemery.expressing

Composable methods to evaluate boolean expressions, make assertions, wait for conditions, and take action when preconditions are met.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
Evaluations Builds fluent expressions to make assertions and evaluate boolean conditions.
Expressions Factory methods for operators, features, and other expression items.
Expressive Builds fluent expressions to make assertions, evaluate boolean expressions, wait for conditions, and take action when preconditions are met.
FeatureExpressions Syntactic sugar for boolean features.
FeatureSampler<S,F> A sampler that samples a feature of a subject.
ForwardingExpressive An Expressive that forwards to another Expressive to create default tickers and prepare conditions for polling.
PublishingCondition Wraps a condition to publish the result of each evaluation.
QuietlyTrue Quietly evaluates whether a boolean value is true.
SamplerCondition<V> A condition that is satisfied when a sampled variable satisfies some criteria.
 

Package com.dhemery.expressing Description

Composable methods to evaluate boolean expressions, make assertions, wait for conditions, and take action when preconditions are met.
